trailingComments.value:
*
 * Handles for resizable, draggable, on-canvas objects.
 * @param {object} options
 * @param {JQuery} options.$handles_container
 * @param {JQuery} options.$object_container
 * @param {number} [options.outset=0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_handles_offset_left=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_handles_offset_top=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_ghost_offset_left=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_ghost_offset_top=() => 0]
 * @param {boolean} [options.size_only=false]
 * @param {() => { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }} options.get_rect
 * @param {(rect: { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }) => void} options.set_rect
 * @param {(rect: { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }, x_axis: -1 | 0 | 1, y_axis: -1 | 0 | 1) => { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }} [options.constrain_rect]
 * @param {boolean} [options.thick]
 * @constructor
 * @property {HTMLElement[]} handles
 * @property {() => void} hide
 * @property {() => void} show
 * @property {HTMLElement[]} handles
@TODO: decide between Math.floor/Math.ceil/Math.round for these values

leadingComments.value: @TODO: decide between Math.floor/Math.ceil/Math.round for these values
give middle region min size of one (1) canvas pixel
For main canvas handles, where only the right/bottom handles are interactive,
extend the middle regions left/up into the unused space of the useless handles.
(This must be after middle_start is used above.)

trailingComments.value: It shouldn't scroll when hiding/showing handles, so don't use jQuery hide/show or CSS display.

leadingComments.value: It shouldn't scroll when hiding/showing handles, so don't use jQuery hide/show or CSS display.

*
 * Handles for resizable, draggable, on-canvas objects.
 * @param {object} options
 * @param {JQuery} options.$handles_container
 * @param {JQuery} options.$object_container
 * @param {number} [options.outset=0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_handles_offset_left=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_handles_offset_top=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_ghost_offset_left=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_ghost_offset_top=() => 0]
 * @param {boolean} [options.size_only=false]
 * @param {() => { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }} options.get_rect
 * @param {(rect: { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }) => void} options.set_rect
 * @param {(rect: { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }, x_axis: -1 | 0 | 1, y_axis: -1 | 0 | 1) => { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }} [options.constrain_rect]
 * @param {boolean} [options.thick]
 * @constructor
 * @property {HTMLElement[]} handles
 * @property {() => void} hide
 * @property {() => void} show
 * @property {HTMLElement[]} handles

comments.value:
*
 * Handles for resizable, draggable, on-canvas objects.
 * @param {object} options
 * @param {JQuery} options.$handles_container
 * @param {JQuery} options.$object_container
 * @param {number} [options.outset=0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_handles_offset_left=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_handles_offset_top=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_ghost_offset_left=() => 0]
 * @param {() => number} [options.get_ghost_offset_top=() => 0]
 * @param {boolean} [options.size_only=false]
 * @param {() => { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }} options.get_rect
 * @param {(rect: { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }) => void} options.set_rect
 * @param {(rect: { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }, x_axis: -1 | 0 | 1, y_axis: -1 | 0 | 1) => { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number }} [options.constrain_rect]
 * @param {boolean} [options.thick]
 * @constructor
 * @property {HTMLElement[]} handles
 * @property {() => void} hide
 * @property {() => void} show
 * @property {HTMLElement[]} handles
@TODO: decide between Math.floor/Math.ceil/Math.round for these values
give middle region min size of one (1) canvas pixel
For main canvas handles, where only the right/bottom handles are interactive,
extend the middle regions left/up into the unused space of the useless handles.
(This must be after middle_start is used above.)
It shouldn't scroll when hiding/showing handles, so don't use jQuery hide/show or CSS display.
